name: Beads Task Tracker (Unified)
description: Unified task detection and management with Graphiti integration, auto-detect, auto-close, and configurable capture filters
author: Blitz + Dexter (collaboration)

autoDetect.description: Automatically detect and create tasks from conversations

autoClose.description: Automatically close tasks when completion is detected

autoCaptureFilter.description: Filter for auto-detection: 'all' processes both user and assistant, 'user_only' prevents feedback loops

detectionThreshold.description: Minimum confidence to auto-detect a task (0-1)

requireConfirmation.description: Require user confirmation before auto-creating tasks

linkToGraphiti.description: Link task events (create/close/update) to Graphiti episodes

graphitiEndpoint.description: Graphiti MCP server endpoint (if linkToGraphiti is true)

graphitiGroupId.description: Graphiti group ID for task events
